name: ThreatConnect
description: The ThreatConnect plugin is used to pull IoCs of type File (MD5 and SHA256), URL, Host and Address (IPv4 and IPv6) from the Indicators under the Intelligence Requirements from ThreatConnect. This plugin also supports sharing File (MD5 and SHA256), URL, Host and Address (IPv4 and IPv6) to the ThreatConnect's Group under the Intelligence Requirements using the Add to Group action.

configuration.label: Access ID
configuration.description: ThreatConnect API User Access ID. Generate the Access ID from Settings > Org Settings > Membership > Create API User.

configuration.label: Secret Key
configuration.description: ThreatConnect API User Secret Key. Generate the Access ID from Settings > Org Settings > Membership > Create API User.

configuration.label: Type of Threat Indicator
configuration.description: Type of threat Indicator you want to pull from ThreatConnect.

configuration.label: Enable Polling
configuration.description: Enable/Disable polling data from ThreatConnect. Disable if you only need to push indicators to ThreatConnect.

configuration.label: Initial Range (in days)
configuration.description: Number of days to pull the data for the initial run.
